Classes/CollectionViewChatLayout.html#/s.abstract: tries to process only the elements that are currently visible on the screen. But often it is not needed. This flag allows you to have fine control over this behaviour.

Classes/CollectionViewChatLayout.html#/c.abstract: Cleans up after any animated changes to the view’s bounds or after the insertion or deletion of items.

Classes/CollectionViewChatLayout.html#/c.abstract: Asks the layout object if changes to a self-sizing cell require a layout update.

Classes/CollectionViewChatLayout.html#/c.name: shouldInvalidateLayout(forBoundsChange:)
Classes/CollectionViewChatLayout.html#/c.abstract: Asks the layout object if the new bounds require a layout update.

Classes/CollectionViewChatLayout.html#/c.name: invalidationContext(forBoundsChange:)

Classes/CollectionViewChatLayout.html#/c.name: targetContentOffset(forProposedContentOffset:)

Classes/CollectionViewChatLayout.html#/c.name: finalLayoutAttributesForDisappearingItem(at:)

Classes/CollectionViewChatLayout.html#/c.name: initialLayoutAttributesForAppearingSupplementaryElement(ofKind:at:)
Classes/CollectionViewChatLayout.html#/c.abstract: Retrieves the starting layout information for a supplementary view being inserted into the collection view.

Classes/CollectionViewChatLayout.html#/c.name: finalLayoutAttributesForDisappearingSupplementaryElement(ofKind:at:)
Classes/CollectionViewChatLayout.html#/c.abstract: Retrieves the final layout information for a supplementary view that is about to be removed from the collection view.
